output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the total time spent with Sarah today (including face-to-face counseling, history review, prescribing decisions, and documentation). Time documentation is required to select the correct CPT code (E/M + Psychotherapy add-on).
output_data.suggested_answer: 45-50 minutes (Standard duration for established combined medication management and therapy)?

primary_code.rationale: Cannot assign the primary E/M code (9921X) or the appropriate psychotherapy timing (9083X) without the documented duration of the session.

output_data.medical_necessity: The service involved monitoring and adjustment of psychotropic medication (*Sertraline* titration), management of a chronic condition (*Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder* F33.1), and psychotherapy addressing passive suicidal ideation and core depressive symptoms (guilt, anhedonia).
